华大智造在PAG Asia 2024上推出农业大规模低通全基因组测序全流程解决方案华大智造是一家致力于构建推动生命科学创新的核心工具和技术的公司，今日宣布推出面向农业大规模低通全基因组测序（Low pass 全基因组测序）的高效全流程解决方案。 -pass WGS）基于其专有的 DNBSEQTM 平台，于今年的亚洲国际植物和动物基因组会议（PAG Asia 2024）期间进行，该会议于 6 月 5 日至 7 日在中国深圳举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/MGI-Tech-Launches-Whole-Workflow-Solution-for-Agriculture-Large-Scale-Low-pass-Whole-Genome-Sequencing-at-PAG-亚洲-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/MGI-Tech-Launches-Whole-Workflow-Solution-for-Agriculture-Large-Scale-Low-pass-Whole-Genome-Sequencing-at-PAG- Asia-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec49c09d-5851-4118-ab9d-c36801bffc85 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 05:08:00 -0400 MGI Tech launches whole workflow solution for agricultural large-scale low-pass whole genome sequencing at PAG Asia 2024

研究表明，气候变化政策忽视了儿童的心理健康和特殊需求最近的一项研究强调了气候变化政策中针对儿童的适应措施的迫切需要，揭示了在解决儿童健康和心理健康方面的巨大差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Climate-change-policies-neglect-childrens-mental-health-and-specific-needs-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Climate-change-policies-neglect-childrens-mental-health-and-specific-needs-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=022eecaf-ed23-43ea-a9df-486a3528e8d6 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 00:57:00 -0400 Climate change policies neglect children's mental health and specific needs, study reveals

研究发现，父亲在受孕前的饮食会影响孩子的代谢健康研究表明，父亲的高脂肪饮食可以通过精子线粒体 RNA 的变化影响后代的代谢健康，可能导致葡萄糖不耐受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Fathers-diet-before-conception-can-impact-childrens-metabolic-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Fathers-diet-before-conception-can-impact-childrens-metabolic-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca0dba9f-c3f4-4fa2-80d9-bc080fc7fffc Fri, 07 Jun 2024 00:33:00 -0400 Father's diet before conception can impact children's metabolic health, study finds
